page.title: 06ECONOMICS
page.content: {THE ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND}has had a branch in the same building in the village since Old Market Day,September 25th 1832. The Manager is shared with the branch at Elie. Over and above the bank employs three other members of staff. Opening hours are 09.30 till 12.30; 13.30 until 15.30. Late night opening is on Thursdays from 16.30 to 17.30 over and above the daily hours. The bank is closed on Saturdays. Banking is also available through the Post Office Giro Bank at the village sub-post office.
